code:
%%{Education_LMS_Portal}}}%%
stateDiagram-v2
    [Education_ClassroomService] --> Created: Create Todo
    Created --> InProgress: Start Work
    Created --> Cancelled: Cancel
    InProgress --> OnHold: Pause
    InProgress --> Completed: Complete
    InProgress --> Cancelled: Cancel
    OnHold --> InProgress: Resume
    OnHold --> Cancelled: Cancel
    Completed --> [Education_ClassroomService]
    Cancelled --> [Education_ClassroomService]

    state Created {Education_LMS_Portal] --> Draft
        Draft --> ReadyToStart: Finalize
        ReadyToStart --> [Education_ClassroomService]
    }

    state InProgress {Education_GradeSync] --> Started
        Started --> InReview: Submit for Review
        InReview --> Started: Request Changes
        InReview --> [Education_ClassroomService]: Approve
    }

    state OnHold {Education_StudentDB] --> Blocked
        [Education_StudentDB] --> Deferred
        Blocked --> [Education_StudentDB]: Unblock
        Deferred --> [Education_GradeSync]: Prioritize
    }

    state Completed {Education_ContentCDN] --> Done
        [Education_StudentDB] --> PartiallyDone
        Done --> [Education_GradeSync]
        PartiallyDone --> [Education_ClassroomService]
    }

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 让我们从头开始，先确定入口点。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 让我澄清一下，Generic Diagram的作用是...

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 最后，流程到达Generic Diagram结束。
